mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account(id, password, name, email, phone) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT account.id , account.password, account.name , hwstore.macaddress FROM thirts.hwstore right JOIN thirts.account ON hwstore.id = account.id WHERE account.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO speed(mode, max_v, average_v, distance , time, score, count, falldown, speed, gyro, beacon, location, HW, date) VALUES (#{mode}, ${max_v}, ${average_v}, ${distance}, ${time}, #{score}, #{count}, #{falldown}, #{speed}, #{gyro}, #{beacon}, #{location}, #{macaddress}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT speed.mode, speed.num, speed.max_v , speed.average_v , speed.distance , speed.time, speed.score, speed.falldown, speed.speed, speed.gyro, speed.beacon, speed.location, hwstore.id, speed.date FROM thirts.speed right JOIN thirts.hwstore ON speed.HW = hwstore.macaddress WHERE id=#{id} order by speed.num desc limit 1
